New Records: Kohli scored 122 not out, breaking a century drought in T20I after 83 innings; Bhuvneshwar Kumar took 5 wickets for 4 runs in his 4 overs
Key Match Events: Kohli Mis-hit a pull but Ibrahim Zadran dropped it; Kohli hit a six off Rashid Khan and then a no-look pull for another six; Bhuvneshwar Kumar's 5-wicket haul left Afghanistan struggling at 21 for 6
Pre-Game Insights: India made three changes; Afghanistan looked dazed less than 24 hours after their loss to Pakistan; the match was a dead rubber
Post-Match Reflections: Kohli acknowledged his wife Anushka for her support during his century drought; Afghanistan's poor catching and bowling cost them the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the Men's T20 Asia Cup; Sidharth Monga is the assistant editor at ESPNcricinfo
